short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resize the Canvas of your favorite Facebook games to how it used to be.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Last week Facebook changed the way that games on their platform work. They now have a minimum height which is a problem for users with small screens. This extension fixes that issue.
